definition.text: It is a server (usually running at the Internet) that provides programatic access to it;s resources. This enables algorithms to access those resources. When those resources are data, then it allow anyone to fetch that data by executing predefined queries to the API Server.

paragraphs.text: Right click and Edit to enter edit mode and change this text. ENTER to write new paragraphs. ESC to exit edit mode. Then you can use docs.save to save your changes and app.contribute to send it to the main repository.
